attributes.action: create a marrage guidance service for couples who have had a partner working as a low level spy for MI5 or SIS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surly after being a low level spy and going back to your wife or husband it must be hard and i'm sure help would be much appreciated rather than just being handed your resignation.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
